verses.name: Revelation 11:4
verses.text: These are the two olive trees, and the two candlesticks standing before the God of the earth.

verses.name: Revelation 11:5
verses.text: And if any man will hurt them, fire proceedeth out of their mouth, and devoureth their enemies: and if any man will hurt them, he must in this manner be killed.

verses.name: Revelation 11:6
verses.text: These have power to shut heaven, that it rain not in the days of their prophecy: and have power over waters to turn them to blood, and to smite the earth with all plagues, as often as they will.
